author: REGINALDO
title: It could be better
review:
I do not know where Lego got the idea from this set. I do not understand connectivity between the diamond safe with a plane. Simply ridiculous, without creativity, meaningless, no connectivity, and no gameplay.

A policeman on a plane descends to arrest a diamond thief, how? At where? And explain to your son that a plane cop arrests a thug in town or wherever he goes. Your son will question you how does the officer get off the plane, if airplanes precision from an airport.

The policeman wears an oxygen mask, will he fly so high that he needs this mask, this set would be more for a military plane than a police plane.

In fact, they have erred in the construction and idealization of this set, subsiding the imagination of children, and especially of adults who love Lego.

However, it takes calm, no one is perfect. But I do not know if it will have much acceptance. For me, note 1, and your note and observation ...

author: Beniaminek
title: Rubies from nowhere
review: Totalnie bez sensu pomysl. Jest sobie sejfik z krysztalami i alarmem na srodku niczego, to az prosi sie aby nic do niego nie wkladac. I w ogóle pomysl na lapanie zlodzieja za pomoca samolotu. No kompletny bezsens : D. Desantuje sie na niego bez spadochronu z kajdankami? Samolot buduje sie na jednym wielkim prefabrykacie, jest lekki, nie trzeba wielu czesci do niego wiec nawet logiczny. No i sam w sobie jest ekstra, jak wszystkie pojazdy latajace xd. Ale pomysl na ten zestaw byl zly.
